l:dependency.name: VMWare ESX Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Integrates Jenkins with a ESX server to revert virtual machines to snapshot

l:dependency.name: Logging
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.

l:dependency.name: Collections
l:dependency.l:description: Types that extend and augment the Java Collections Framework.

l:dependency.name: VMware VI (vSphere) Java API
l:dependency.l:description: Java API for accessing VMWare web services API

l:dependency.name: json-lib
l:dependency.l:description: Java library for transforming beans, maps, collections, java arrays and XML to JSON.

l:dependency.name: XML Commons External Components XML APIs
l:dependency.l:description: xml-commons provides an Apache-hosted set of DOM, SAX, and JAXP interfaces for use in other xml-based projects. Our hope is that we can standardize on both a common version and packaging scheme for these critical XML standards interfaces to make the lives of both our developers and users easier. The External Components portion of xml-commons contains interfaces that are defined by external standards organizations. For DOM, that's the W3C; for SAX it's David Megginson and sax.sourceforge.net; for JAXP it's Sun.

l:dependency.name: JSch
l:dependency.l:description: JSch is a pure Java implementation of SSH2

l:dependency.name: ezmorph
l:dependency.l:description: Simple java library for transforming an Object to another Object.

l:dependency.name: dom4j
l:dependency.l:description: dom4j: the flexible XML framework for Java

l:dependency.name: Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Commons.Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.
